title: Worksheet 3: Getting User Input
description: Learn how to ask users for information and make interactive programs

problems.title: What is input()?
problems.content: The input() function asks the user to type something and gives it back to your program!
problems.example:
name = input("What is your name? ")
print("Hello, " + name)
problems.task: Run the example code and type your name when asked.
problems.starterCode:
name = input("What is your name? ")
print("Hello, " + name)
problems.expectedOutput:
What is your name? [user types name]
Hello, [name]
problems.hint: The input() function waits for you to type something and press Enter!
